strapiEvent.name: Farm Tour
strapiEvent.location: 581 NE Douglas Cemetery Rd, Gentry AR 72734
strapiEvent.description:
We will be hosting free public farm tour days twice a month this spring and summer. Bring the family to visit the animals.

Eggs and produce from the farm may be available for purchase.

Check out our website for dates and time. We hope to see you there!

The farm is open from 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm.
